item.description:
Level One Vodka presents the 4th of July party at STIX Lounge

Come celebrate your basic freedom, Your freedom to drink! Brought to you by LEVEL VODKA!!

The 4th of July Party at Stix! Brought to you by LEVEL VODKA!!



http://www.stixboston...

MANTRA IS CLOSED this weekend so we have moved over the party to conveniently located STIX LOUNGE near the Prudential!!

Grill during the day and come party at Night. The only place to be on the 4th of July!!

2 Floors, 2 DJ's..Just 1 place to be..STIX restaurant and Lounge

Upstairs: Dj Alkan - Spinning International, Hip-pop !

Downstairs: Dj Su Master - Top 40, Desi, Bhangra, Bollywood, Mashups !

$10 on guestlist. Free before 11 pm, 21+

Enjoy your favorite drink in our patio & watch the fireworks at STIX!!

For guestlist email Ravi at: Highrollerboston@gmail.com or call/txt 617-416-8705.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask for Ravi. I will be at the Door
item.name: Level One Vodka presents the 4th of July party at STIX Lounge
